extendedInfo.description: Spirit, by Marco Mazzoli. The critically acclaimed iPhone hit now on Android and newly presented in an XHD / THD version that is Gingerbread (2.3+) / Honeycomb (3.0+), Tegra 2 and Xperia PLAY optimized.Specially for the Android version: both Spirit and Spirit HD (tablet version) included in the same package. Buy once and play both versions of the game on your different devices.Simple and fun to play. No shooting. No on-screen controls. Just slide your finger and Spirit will mimic your movements. Check out what people are saying about it:â¢ "Spirit is a paradigm example of independent game development for the iPhone" - 'Must Have', No DPad â¢ "If you're looking for a challenging new arcade experience, this one's easy to recommend" - Touch Arcadeâ¢ "Spirit is a budget gem you donât want to miss" - TouchGenâ¢ "One of the best arcade-style apps on the App Store right now" - GameZeboâ¢ "The experience is incredibly fluid and seamless. It just feels right, and no amount of screen-shots can do it justice" - themacfeed.comâ¢ "Hypnotic, compelling stuff" - The Sunday Timesâ¢ "Slick control scheme meets fantastic visual effects and sound design; this is the complete arcade package" - Games Uncovered Take control of Spirit in an intense retro inspired arcade experience, reinvented for Android devices.Guide Spirit against many different enemy types, and distort space to force them into another dimension.Features a fluid, easy to play yet hard to master control system. Relative movement allows you to keep your finger out of the way of the action.Combine links and combos to build up huge scores. Fight your way through increasingly challenging waves, uniquely generated for each game.If you have already purchased the HD version and would like to upgrade, please purchase this version and email us your Google Checkout order number for both your HD and XHD purchases and we'll refund the HD purchase.App2SD supported. Please email any questions.TROUBLESHOOTING:Below are solutions to common problems but feel free to email us if you are still having any problems and we'll get back to you.* If having purchased the game you get a license failure, this is because the purchase may take some time to be recorded on the Google license server. It will resolve within a few hours or you can try restarting your device and reinstalling.* If you purchase on the Android Market website rather than the Android Market App, you will be billed in British Pounds (GBP). Please use the Market App to be billed in your local currency. Sometimes this causes payments to be rejected because of the currency difference.* If your download is declined, your credit card authorisation will have failed. Please update your card details (usually the address doesn't match) and retry the purchase.* If the package will not install, please try unmounting the SD card (Settings, Storage) during install and you can then move the game to SD card using (Settings, Applications) although you may need to reboot before this will work. * Please note that if you are purchasing from within the EU, VAT will be added at the last stage of your purchase. We are sorry it is not possible for this to be more clearly shown at present.* The game uses Google's standard licensing service. It will use the internet to retrieve a license which will expire periodically and then be automatically renewed. The longer you have the game, the longer the time between license renewals.If you have any other problems or other feedback, please don't hesitate to drop us an email and we'll get back to you.Small Print: VAT added within EU. May require license from Google & collect anonymous stats.

reviews.title: Stopped Working
reviews.comment: It force closes on nexus 7 (2012 version) and samsung galaxy s plus (GTI9001), it used to work fine, not sure if its related but it stopped working when i upgraded both devices to Jelly Bean, its a brilliant game i just cant play it anymore!  Back to 5 stars when this is fixed
reviews.author: Fionn O\' Reilly

reviews.title: One of the best games for touch interface
reviews.comment: I\'ve played Spirit for hundreds of hours since it came out on iOS.  I was able to work out small issues once I switched to HTC One.    The game is brilliant.  Intelligent concept, great graphics, awesome music and skillful animations.  No need to shoot anything and that matters very much.  I\'d still like to get some sort of check points so there would be no need to go to 7-1 every time I play. Also, please make the touch more sensitive.  It had been requested on iOS and fulfilled.  I don\'t see why can\'t it happen here....  Excellent, excellent concept.  Great work!!!
reviews.author: GOVAUS1

reviews.title: Stopped working on my new galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Normally 5 stars for innovation and awesomeness but a problem has come up: Had worked earlier and I got this phone a week ago; thought it was just me but others report similar issue.  Touch the icon, screen goes black, and in 10 seconds the Android home screen reappears. Is this a game problem or new os problem as samsung had pushed an os update too.  Thanks!
reviews.author: Dave C

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: A nice little game shame about the DRM nonsense
reviews.author: Anthony Aldridge

reviews.title: Great game, broken on newer android.
reviews.comment: Was a great game until recent android updates.  Now it force closes on startup on both my Nexus 7 and Galaxy Nexus.  5 stars once it works again.
reviews.author: Erik Hendriks

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Stopped working on Samsung Galaxy Note. FCs on startup.
reviews.author: Georgios Trantas

reviews.title: My favourite game stopped working
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work any more after my phone\'s latest official FW update. Splash screen shows, then I\'m simply back on my homescreen. No FC msg... UPDATE: uninstall and reinstall fixes this issue
reviews.author: Rudmer Hoekstra

reviews.title: Spirit XHD
reviews.comment: Force closed after Android 4.3 update. I uninstalled, then reloaded, & now is running great!
reviews.author: Robert Bolick

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Smooth and great graphics, and just great game, my favorite
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mesmerizing!
reviews.comment: Spirit is so much more playable on my device now. It doesn\'t slow down overtime or the performance doesn\'t degrade the longer I play it anymore, probably because I disabled Scoreloop. Whatever it was, it\'s fixed now. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Feels classic and modern at once
reviews.comment: Great-looking & sounding game with great gameplay. Reminiscent of \'80s arcade games with some \'90s neon and modern graphic flair and touchscreen sensibility. Extra kudos for making it work in both portrait and landscape orientations.
reviews.author: Herkimer Jones

reviews.title: It\'s as addictive as it is beautiful
reviews.comment: Well, actually I wasn\'t very into it on my razr phone, but playing it on my nexus 7 with a stylus is incredible.
reviews.author: Aaron Bohannon

reviews.title: Polished game
reviews.comment: Simple but difficult and yet highly addictive.  Would recommend.  But a few more modes would give it 5* but still a must have game.
reviews.author: Simon Downs

reviews.title: Jelly Bean?
reviews.comment: I am on android 4.1.2 Jelly Bean and there\'s a black bar going down the screen similar in appearance to a screen being smashed and broken pixels. Loved this game on ICS. Please fix :]
reviews.author: Daniel O\'Connor

reviews.title: Best android game
reviews.comment: Hands Down my fav
reviews.author: Nick Sherman

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: I love it and I am addicted to it.
reviews.author: Nicol\303\241s Garc\303\255a

reviews.title: Super
reviews.comment: Great, the xhd version sounds better and is more reactive thus playable than the regular hd version on Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Jopaajooo Jopasejoo

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: AWESOME game. AMAZING  graphics.  DEVELOPER PROVIDES EXCELLENT SUPPORT  -DROID RAZRm
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New Style Game, Fun, Fun, Fun
reviews.comment: Sony Tablet S
reviews.author: Marielle Chevrier

reviews.title: Hi-Def Setting????
reviews.comment: I have a new Galaxy Note 2 and cannot figure out the form factor or graphics setting to make the XHD game hi-def. I\'ve tried phone vs  tablet settings as well. Any help???
reviews.author: A Google User
